languages.text: Будто по велению мрачной неизвестной силы, мятежники разом замолки и в едином движении расступились. Помещение наполнилось липкой тишиной. Там, куда были обращены взгляды еретиков, сверкнула металлическая конструкция с линзой на вершине — освещенная единственным лучом солнца, она возвышалась в центре из круга тающих свечей, стопок книг и нечестивых символов на полу.

traits.locale_text: Будто по велению мрачной неизвестной силы, мятежники разом замолки и в едином движении расступились. Помещение наполнилось липкой тишиной. Там, куда были обращены взгляды еретиков, сверкнула металлическая конструкция с линзой на вершине — освещенная единственным лучом солнца, она возвышалась в центре из круга тающих свечей, стопок книг и нечестивых символов на полу.

languages.text: As if commanded by a grim unseen force, the insurgents fell silent at once and, in a single movement, parted. A thick, sticky silence filled the room. The heretics' gazes were turned toward a metal structure with a lens on top of it, standing tall in the middle of a circle of melting candles, piles of books, and unholy symbols drawn on the floor. The structure flashed as a single sunray illuminated it.
languages.original_text: Будто по велению мрачной неизвестной силы, мятежники разом замолки и в едином движении расступились. Помещение наполнилось липкой тишиной. Там, куда были обращены взгляды еретиков, сверкнула металлическая конструкция с линзой на вершине — освещенная единственным лучом солнца, она возвышалась в центре из круга тающих свечей, стопок книг и нечестивых символов на полу.

traits.locale_text: As if commanded by a grim unseen force, the insurgents fell silent and, in a single movement, stepped to the sides to make way. A thick, sticky silence filled the room. The heretics' gazes were turned toward a metal structure with a lens on top of it, standing tall in the middle of a circle of melting candles, piles of books, and unholy symbols drawn on the floor. The structure flashed as a single sunray illuminated it.

The heretics' gazes were turned toward a metal structure with a lens on top of it, standing tall in the middle of a circle of melting candles, piles of books, and unholy symbols drawn on the floor. The structure flashed as a single sunray illuminated it.

The heretics' gazes were turned toward a metal structure with a lens on top of it, standing tall in the middle of a circle of melting candles, piles of books, and unholy symbols drawn on the floor. The structure flashed as a single sunray illuminated it.

As if commanded by a grim unseen force, the insurgents fell silent at once and, in a single movement, parted. A thick, sticky silence filled the room. The heretics' gazes were turned toward a metal structure with a lens on top of it, standing tall in the middle of a circle of melting candles, piles of books, and unholy symbols drawn on the floor. The structure flashed as a single sunray illuminated it.

languages.text: Wie auf Befehl einer düsteren, unsichtbaren Macht verstummten die Aufständischen und teilten sich mit einer einzigen Bewegung. Ein dickes, klebriges Schweigen legte sich über den Raum. Die Blicke der Ketzer waren auf ein metallenes Gebilde mit einer Linse darauf gerichtet, das in der Mitte eines Kreises aus schmelzenden Kerzen und Bücherstapeln emporragte. Der Boden war mit unheiligen Symbolen bemalt. Das Gebilde blitzte auf, als es von einem einzelnen Sonnenstrahl erleuchtet wurde.
languages.original_text: As if commanded by a grim unseen force, the insurgents fell silent at once and, in a single movement, parted. A thick, sticky silence filled the room. The heretics' gazes were turned toward a metal structure with a lens on top of it, standing tall in the middle of a circle of melting candles, piles of books, and unholy symbols drawn on the floor. The structure flashed as a single sunray illuminated it.

traits.locale_text: Wie auf Befehl einer düsteren, unsichtbaren Macht verstummten die Aufständischen und teilten sich mit einer einzigen Bewegung. Ein dickes, klebriges Schweigen legte sich über den Raum. Die Blicke der Ketzer waren auf ein metallenes Gebilde mit einer Linse darauf gerichtet, das in der Mitte eines Kreises aus schmelzenden Kerzen und Bücherstapeln emporragte. Der Boden war mit unheiligen Symbolen bemalt. Das Gebilde blitzte auf, als es von einem einzelnen Sonnenstrahl erleuchtet wurde.

languages.text: Comme commandés par une force invisible et sinistre, les insurgés se taisent d'un coup et se séparent d'un seul mouvement. Un silence épais et poisseux remplit la pièce. Les regards des hérétiques se tournent vers une structure métallique surmontée d'une lentille, dressée au milieu d'un cercle de bougies allumées, de piles de livres et de symboles impies dessinés au sol. La structure projette un éclair lorsqu'un unique rayon de soleil l'illumine.
languages.original_text: As if commanded by a grim unseen force, the insurgents fell silent at once and, in a single movement, parted. A thick, sticky silence filled the room. The heretics' gazes were turned toward a metal structure with a lens on top of it, standing tall in the middle of a circle of melting candles, piles of books, and unholy symbols drawn on the floor. The structure flashed as a single sunray illuminated it.

traits.locale_text: Comme commandés par une force invisible et sinistre, les insurgés se taisent d'un coup et se séparent d'un seul mouvement. Un silence épais et poisseux remplit la pièce. Les regards des hérétiques se tournent vers une structure métallique surmontée d'une lentille, dressée au milieu d'un cercle de bougies allumées, de piles de livres et de symboles impies dessinés au sol. La structure projette un éclair lorsqu'un unique rayon de soleil l'illumine.

languages.text: 那些叛乱分子仿佛被某种看不见的可怕力量指挥着。他们立刻安静下来，一声不响地散开了，房间里只有沉闷的静默。异端分子将目光投向某件金属造物，那件造物上安装着一枚透镜，高高矗立在地板上画着的邪恶符号之间，周围还围着一圈融化的蜡烛与成堆的书。射进来的阳光照亮了那件造物，它开始闪闪发光。
languages.original_text: As if commanded by a grim unseen force, the insurgents fell silent at once and, in a single movement, parted. A thick, sticky silence filled the room. The heretics' gazes were turned toward a metal structure with a lens on top of it, standing tall in the middle of a circle of melting candles, piles of books, and unholy symbols drawn on the floor. The structure flashed as a single sunray illuminated it.

traits.locale_text: 那些叛乱分子仿佛被某种看不见的可怕力量指挥着。他们立刻安静下来，一声不响地散开了，房间里只有沉闷的静默。异端分子将目光投向某件金属造物，那件造物上安装着一枚透镜，高高矗立在地板上画着的邪恶符号之间，周围还围着一圈融化的蜡烛与成堆的书。射进来的阳光照亮了那件造物，它开始闪闪发光。

languages.text: まるで目に見えぬ恐ろしい力に命じられたかのように、反乱軍は一斉に沈黙し、一挙に解散した。濃厚な、ねっとりとした沈黙が部屋を満たした。異端者たちの視線は、溶けたろうそく、書物の山、床に描かれた不浄な文様の輪の中心にそびえ立つ、レンズの取り付けられた金属製の構造物に向けられた。一条の太陽光線に照らされ、構造物はきらめいた。
languages.original_text: As if commanded by a grim unseen force, the insurgents fell silent at once and, in a single movement, parted. A thick, sticky silence filled the room. The heretics' gazes were turned toward a metal structure with a lens on top of it, standing tall in the middle of a circle of melting candles, piles of books, and unholy symbols drawn on the floor. The structure flashed as a single sunray illuminated it.

traits.locale_text: まるで目に見えぬ恐ろしい力に命じられたかのように、反乱軍は一斉に沈黙し、一挙に解散した。濃厚な、ねっとりとした沈黙が部屋を満たした。異端者たちの視線は、溶けたろうそく、書物の山、床に描かれた不浄な文様の輪の中心にそびえ立つ、レンズの取り付けられた金属製の構造物に向けられた。一条の太陽光線に照らされ、構造物はきらめいた。

languages.text: Como comandados por una sombría fuerza invisible, los insurgentes callaron de inmediato y, en un solo movimiento, se separaron. Un silencio espeso y empalagoso llenó la habitación. Las miradas de los herejes se dirigieron hacia una estructura metálica con una lente encima, de pie en medio de un círculo de velas derritiéndose, montones de libros y símbolos impíos dibujados en el suelo. La estructura brilló cuando un único rayo de sol la iluminó.
languages.original_text: As if commanded by a grim unseen force, the insurgents fell silent at once and, in a single movement, parted. A thick, sticky silence filled the room. The heretics' gazes were turned toward a metal structure with a lens on top of it, standing tall in the middle of a circle of melting candles, piles of books, and unholy symbols drawn on the floor. The structure flashed as a single sunray illuminated it.

traits.locale_text: Como comandados por una sombría fuerza invisible, los insurgentes callaron de inmediato y, en un solo movimiento, se separaron. Un silencio espeso y empalagoso llenó la habitación. Las miradas de los herejes se dirigieron hacia una estructura metálica con una lente encima, de pie en medio de un círculo de velas derritiéndose, montones de libros y símbolos impíos dibujados en el suelo. La estructura brilló cuando un único rayo de sol la iluminó.

languages.text: Asiler görünmez, acımasız bir güç tarafından yönlendiriliyormuş gibi bir anda sessizliğe büründü ve tek bir hareketle ayrıldı. Odayı yoğun, inatçı bir sessizlik doldurdu. Kâfirlerin bakışları; eriyen mumlar, kitap yığınları ve yere çizilmiş uğursuz sembollerden oluşan bir çemberin ortasında dimdik duran ve üzerinde mercek bulunan metal bir yapıya çevrildi. Üstüne tek bir ışık hüzmesi düşen yapı parladı.
languages.original_text: As if commanded by a grim unseen force, the insurgents fell silent at once and, in a single movement, parted. A thick, sticky silence filled the room. The heretics' gazes were turned toward a metal structure with a lens on top of it, standing tall in the middle of a circle of melting candles, piles of books, and unholy symbols drawn on the floor. The structure flashed as a single sunray illuminated it.

traits.locale_text: Asiler görünmez, acımasız bir güç tarafından yönlendiriliyormuş gibi bir anda sessizliğe büründü ve tek bir hareketle ayrıldı. Odayı yoğun, inatçı bir sessizlik doldurdu. Kâfirlerin bakışları; eriyen mumlar, kitap yığınları ve yere çizilmiş uğursuz sembollerden oluşan bir çemberin ortasında dimdik duran ve üzerinde mercek bulunan metal bir yapıya çevrildi. Üstüne tek bir ışık hüzmesi düşen yapı parladı.
